metadata.title: CVE-2020-8032 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A Insecure Temporary File vulnerability in the packaging of cyrus-sasl of openSUSE Factory allows local attackers to escalate to root. This issue affects: openSUSE Factory cyrus-sasl version 2.1.27-4.2 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: cyrus-sasl2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
